MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK9 postcode area of Craigforth. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4.30pm to carry out repairs to a damaged pole near Forth Valley Campus and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.20pm on Saturday 27th February 2021.
